string.text: Help Gonta protect the camp.
Wait for night to come.
Join the detachment.
Empty out the bandit camp.
Talk to Gonta.
Hello, guys. Why the serious mood?
Well, whats the mood like?

Try and have some fun here… We’ve been here for a long time, helped other in peace, helped newcomers to the Zone to survive.. all was fine until the bandits came around. I think its time to finally rid ourselves of this mess. But.. there is only three of us and I am very worried, we cannot do this on our own. Will you be willing to join us? We need to act quickly before they gather more people.
Have you decided to go with us while we still have the chance?
Yes, no matter what, I’m with you!
No, I can’t now.
Here’s our man! Excellent! Now, let us prepare slowly - rest, check our equipment. We shall strike when it’s dark, it would be best by midnight. We’ll give them a taste of their own medicine..
I understand. Come with us if you decide to.
Well, will we get going?
My hands are itching.. But its early, we must wait.
Now is not the time to chat!
Ready? GO!

This is great! I’ve just gotten information that there’s no more bandits in the camp! How many of them were there? A dozen.. more? And they all fell? For such a miracle, take this gift from me, its not every day that something like this happens in the Zone!
Thank you for your support, next time they’ll think before crossing us. Here, for your soul.
Go on, in peace.
You ran off and snitched, huh? Do you think we wouldn’t notice how the bandits behaved after your arrival? You’re a rat!
So did I…
Help the bandits.
Kill Gonta.
You’re a serial killer! All I can say is well done. If you need to lay down or relax you can head down to our base not far from here, I’ll tell our boys not to touch you.
Hey, bro, here, this info is interesting.
Well, come on, interested in the info?
In short, I heard that there were problems with the nearby stalkers, so they decided to gather people for a raid.
You know, its not that important, forget it.
Here’s the fucking bitch! I talked to them, no need to wait - just kick them over. And here, for you.
Get out of here, clown!
Maybe you need some help?
No problem, I was happy to help.
Oh so we have a saboteur? That’s just it, a light on the crossing, and get there quickly and we’ll talk.
